ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dvds0 | |- ( A e. ZZ -> A || 0 ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> A || 0 ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( B e. ZZ -> B e. CC ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_subidd | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( B - B ) = 0 ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_breqtrrd | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> A || ( B - B ) ) |
